2005T1002-d-10-08-05-BB.Narrative: ON OCTOBER 8, 2005, APPROXIMATELY 1330 HOURS, Z99018 WAS MOVING THE LOADED CSX HERZOG BALLAST TRAINFROM VERDON (MARTIN MARIETTA QUARRY) TO THE CSX INTERCHANGE AT DOSWELL.  THIS TRAIN CONSISTED OF 2 LOCOMOTIVES AND 54 CARS.  THE MOVEMENT WAS A PROTECTED SHOVING MOVE.  THE TRAIN MOVED FROM THE BBRR MAIN TRACK TO THE CO SIDING AT DOSWELL (CA 113.6) AND PROCEEDED TO THE WYE TRACK.  TRAIN SPEED AT THIS POINT WAS APPROXIMATELY 5 MPH.  AT THIS LOCATION IS A SWITCH TO THE DEPOT TRACK, WHICH RUNS ALONGSIDE THE WYE TRACK.  WEATHER CONDITIONS WERE RAIN AND FOG WITH A FEW INCHES OF RAIN ALREADY DOWN.  JUST BEYOND THE FROG OF THIS SWITCH AND INTO A CURVE, THE TIE AND BALLAST CONDITION WAS POOR.  AS THELOADED CARS CONTINUED OVER THIS SECTION OF TRACK, THE OUTER RAIL OF THE CURVE SEPARATED FROM THE TIES AND TURNED OVER, SNAPPING NEAR THE FROG.  THE 9TH TO THE 17TH HEAD CARS DERAILED, BUT REMAINED UPRIGHT.  THE TRAIN DID NOT GO INTO EMERGENCY BRAKING, BUT THE ENGINEER NOTED THAT THE TRAIN BEGAN TO BOG DOWN.  HE STOPPED THE TRAIN AND NOTIFIED THE CONDUCTOR (ON THE REAR OF THE TRAIN) THAT THERE WASA PROBLEM.  THE CONDUCTOR STARTED WALKING FROM THE REAR OF THE TRAIN; THE ENGINEER STARTED CHECKINGFROM THE HEAD END.  THE ENGINEER FOUND THE SITUATION AT THE NINTH HEAD CAR.  SEVEN CARS WERE OFF THETRACK, BUT REMAINED UPRIGHT.

193627-d-10-15-05-SOO.Narrative: CONDUCTOR ON HZ11 (ENDERLIN ROADSWITCH) KICKED A CAR (UELX100047) WESTWARD DOWN EAST LEAD TOWARD ET02 TRACK, THE CAR STALLED. CONDUCTOR LEFT UELX100047 WHERE IT STALLED AND THEN MADE A MOVE ON ET10 TRACK, SHOVING WEST WARD AND THEN PULLED EASTWARD WITH 21 CARS. HE WAS RIDING THE CARS OUT OF ET10 TRACK AND NOTICED THAT THE UELX100047 WHICH HAD BEEN KICKED TOWARD ET02 TRACK, STARTED ROLLING EAST TOWARD HIS TRAIN. THE  UELX 100047 ROLLED INTO THE SIDE OF THE CARS HE WAS RIDING, STRIKING THE WEST END OF THE 18TH CAR (ADMX 26526) AND INTO THE SIDE OF THE 19TH CAR (ADMX 28244). THE UELX 100047 TIPPED OVER ON IT'S SIDE TO THE SOUTH, FOULING ET01 TRACK. CONDUCTOR SAID HE DID NOT TIE A HANDBRAKE ON THE UELX100047 BECAUSE IT DID NOT ROLL BACK EAST INITIALLY AND HE ASSUMED IT HAD SOME AIR LEFT IN ITAND IT WOULD NOT GO ANYWHERE.
